dea.spamRescue
Class HostInfo

java.lang.Object
  dea.spamRescue.HostInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebugLevels
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeekToolsHI
public abstract class HostInfo
extends Object
implements IDebugLevels

Base class for whois extracting classes.
Rev 1.2 Add received by info. Inprove ip vs host name detection.
Rev 1.1 Force all host names to lowercase since HSQLDB searches are case sensitive.

Author:
David Abigt
